attributes.action: Act on what the public want
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After your losses in the local elections you have said you will listen to what we want.
The majority of us want:
The rich to be taxed slightly more.
The true rate of inflation to be published, ie at least treble the recently published 3%
Car tax to be abolished and placed on petrol with no increase to tax on petrol.
VAT to be reduced to 5% on petrol.
Stamp duty reduced to 2% on houses over £250K.  3% on houses over £500K.
Block on immigrants who cannot support themselves.
Referendum on the EU.

There are many more but if you make a start with these then you may get re-elected.  If not then bye, bye Mr Brown.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
